core.name: AI-Driven Business Design Studio
core.description: Integrates AI-Driven Design Sprints (F045), Business Model Canvas Integration (F047), and Dynamic Copywriting Factory (F046) for comprehensive business design solutions

core.name: Strategic Content and Design Optimizer
core.description: Combines SOSTAC Framework for Content Strategy (F049), SWOT Analysis for UI Design (F048), and Content Performance Attribution (F053) for data-driven content and design optimization

supporting.name: Market Analysis and Design Alignment
supporting.description: Integrates Porter's Five Forces for Market Analysis (F050) with Lean UX Integration with CRM (F051) for informed design decisions and personalized user experiences

supporting.name: AI-Powered Design and Content Evolution
supporting.description: Combines AI-Driven UI Design Evolution (F055) with Virtual Reality UI Prototyping (F056) for continuous design improvement and immersive user experiences

integration.name: Omnichannel Experience Orchestrator
integration.description: Integrates Standardized Marketing Automation (F052) with User Journey Heatmaps (F054) for seamless, data-driven customer experiences across channels
